page.title: 03A Family Weekend.
page.content: The weekend began on Friday evening when Abigail, my friend,came to play.We played a game called "Block".Then Abigail had to go home because we were going to have our tea.We had egg and beans on toast.When we had finished our tea we went outside and played swing ball in the garden.At 8.00pm we came in and had a bath.At half past 8 we went to bed. On Saturday I got up at 7.00am and fed the pig and cleaned her out.For lunch we had lamb.In the afternoon we went to Elvington Garden Party.We played with Rebecca in the garden at Elvington. At 5pm we went home Ifound that my coconut was mouldy but as it was late we could not change it! After tea we had a game of Monopoly and went to bed at 10.30 p.m.
